name: network-overview
title: Network Overview
abstract: Overviews an entire network with respect to the number of nodes, links, density, as well as important nodes.

name: centrality-exploration
title: Centrality Exploration
abstract: Explores nodes based on different centrality measures (degree, in-betweenness).

name: community-exploration
title: Community Exploration
abstract: Explores and compares clusters in the network; their sizes, connections, and important nodes.

name: subgraph-overview
title: Subgraph Overview
abstract: Reviews a specific subgraph, it's important nodes, density, links, and ties to the rest of the network.

name: ego-network-analysis
title: Ego-network Analysis
abstract: Explores the network around a specified node and its neighbors, including important nodes and eventual link weights.

name: temporal-network-exploration
title: Temporal Network Exploration
abstract: Explores a temporal network with overview, evoluation and trends.
